name: VR Scuba Diving - Deep Sea Oceanic Explorer
name_original: VR Scuba Diving - Deep Sea Oceanic Explorer
description:
Welcome to the VR Deep Sea Oceanic Explorer! Enjoy this fun diving experience!
Dive into the deep seas and oceans, between ancient ship wrecks and observe the undewater life in it's full spendor. Meet dolphins, whales, giant squids, moray eels and many more!
Here are some features of this virtual reality scuba diving simulator:

· Fully animated and realistic 3D models

· High Definition Graphics with FULL HD quality

· Compatible with all Cardboard VR Gearsets and similar SBS viewers (side by side)

Designed and published by The Lonely Developer
